column1: apoc.do.case([condition, query, condition, query, ...], elseQuery:'', params:{}) yield value - given a list of conditional / writing query pairs, executes the query associated with the first conditional evaluating to true (or the else query if none are true) with the given parameters
apoc.do.when(condition, ifQuery, elseQuery:'', params:{}) yield value - based on the conditional, executes writing ifQuery or elseQuery with the given parameters
